Dance in Baton Rouge

Are you looking for a great dance studio for your daught and/or son to go to? well on this page you will see the three best studios located right in baton rouge. Scroll down for evn more!

Pirouette Dance Studio

Pirouttte dance studio is a company ran by latoria coleman. dances classes for ages 3-12. they offer jazz, ballet/modern,hip-hop,technique, and a junior and senior competition team!
Adress:9505 airline hwy 70815
Phone:225-395-1842

  • Facebook

Winter Dance Company

Where dance meets the Stage
Adress 9269 Florida blv Ste 102
Phone:225-650-5841

    • En Pointe Dance Company
